item.description:
::: RESCHEDULED :::

I'm leaving everyone's RSVP for October 18th intact. Please take a moment to check your calendar and make sure you can make it on the 31st. If this change in date affects your plans, please revise your RSVP accordingly.

Is there a more appropriate day to be shooting at the cemetery? Hopefully the foliage will hold out until then. In any case, there are some very interesting head stones at these cemeteries that will provide some great photo ops.

A tour of three locations on Cape Ann:

LOCUST GROVE and SEA SIDE CEMETERIES
OAK HILL CEMETERY
MOUNT ADNAH CEMETERY



We'll meet at the Halibut Point parking lot and carpool to the cemeteries due to limited parking at the sites. I'll provide my cell phone number to those who have confirmed their RSVP.

Keeping my fingers crossed for good weather and hope to see you there!


DIRECTIONS TO HALIBUT POINT STATE PARK... From the South and West: Rte. I-95/128 north to Rte. 128 north toward Gloucester/Rockport. After crossing Annisquam River, go 3/4 around first rotary, follow signs for Rt. 127 north (Annisquam and Pigeon Cove). Turn left (approx 6 miles) at the park sign and the Old Farm Inn onto Gott Ave. (turn shortly after the Lobster Pool restaurant.) From Downtown Rockport: Drive north on Rt. 127 approximately 3 miles, turning right onto Gott Ave.
item.how_to_find_us: Due to limited parking at the cemeteries, we'll carpool from this location. Meet in the parking lot.
item.name: Cape Ann Fall Cemetery Tour ::: RESCHEDULED
